overview:
Mr. Roy Stein is an accomplished operator and manager with over 20 years experience in leading, building and operating business units and companies. Solid global management experience in Operations, Business Operations and Corporate Development within telecommunications and clean energy industries. Hands on extensive experience in leading acquisition and integration of companies, ranging from small startups to global large companies.

Experienced operations manager with proven track record in growing business units 2-4 times revenue while working on or below budgets, driving sales growth through compensation plan building, sales targeting and behavior setting, forecasting and pipeline management (Business Operations). Open communicator and team builder, strong analytical ability, process oriented, demonstrated track record in building business and turning a problem or company around.
